item.description:
Please consider a donation on veteran's day to honor the service of the military. Support the troops who have donated more money to Dr Paul than any other candidates.
thisnovember11th.com

If you can give $100, please sign up on that web site, but any donation is welcome. I know it is very close to the Nov 5th fundraiser, so many won't be able to give. If that is the case, please try to see if you can get a friend or family member to donate.
item.name: $1M Veteran's Day Fundraiser
